original_title: The Last Dragons: Protecting Appalachia's Hellbenders
overview: The Last Dragons is an intimate glimpse at North America's Eastern Hellbender, an ancient salamander that lives as much in myth as in reality.... and in many  waters, myths are all that remain of these sentinel stream-dwellers. 10 minutes. English & Spanish Subtitles. Produced by Freshwaters Illustrated in Partnership with the US Forest Service.
title: The Last Dragons: Protecting Appalachia's Hellbenders
